h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (First Encounter)
content: Look for an open covered platform to the left as you descend, and make a quick detour to inspect this area. A Cyan Bat is hiding in the rafters, and after luring it down and defeating it, you can loot one more **Treasure Chest** for an assortment of items.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snowhill_Path_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Snowhill Path Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Frost-Clad Path' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (First Encounter)'.
The content is as follows:
Look for an open covered platform to the left as you descend, and make a quick detour to inspect this area. A Cyan Bat is hiding in the rafters, and after luring it down and defeating it, you can loot one more **Treasure Chest** for an assortment of items.
